title: AP Bruiser Gragas
body:
It isn't even good, why go AP bruiser Gragas top, when you can pick up and learn Ap Bruiser Swain top lane? 
Gragas feels like utter trash atm.

replies.body:
From google...

''Area of Effect, or AoE, are spells which affect more than one target within a **pre-determined radius** set by the game's mechanics. These effects range from HoT spells to DD spells and cover all points in between.''

We argue over the dumbest things xd 

But there are people like j4/zed / zac who have skillshots in a line . soo.. idk

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}

because gragas has more utility 

swain is less mobile and does more dmg .

every champion has their pros and cons 
{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}

> {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}

Swain provides decent utility with an aoe root and q slow onto carry, really good dot damage mid/late game too.

> [{quoted}](name=iNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ayEHA9Ae,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-06T06:11:24.176+0000)
>
> Swain provides decent utility with an aoe root and q slow onto carry, really good dot damage mid/late game too.

swain has 0 mobility though
1 over extend and you're gone

gragas can initiate and dis engage better than birdy

Im not being bias, i like playing both 

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
Swain can just e > q > r > zhonyas = decent aoe dmg and invulnerable for awhile + healing + even more healing with spell vamp + even more healing with spirit visage

and its not aoe, its multi target

no idea why someone said swain has MOBILITY because he has CC....
